titles.title: Shinpi no Sekai El-Hazard TV
Эль-Хазард: Странники
El Hazard TV 1
elhaz tv
神秘の世界エルハザード TV
El-Hazard: The Wanderers
El Hazard - Le monde alternatif
El-Hazard: Странники
El Hazard

anime.description: One quiet Autumn day, the Shinonome High School students are busy preparing for their school festival. Mr. Fujisawa, a rock climbing fanatic, is inspecting the school grounds; the business savvy Nanami is selling box lunches; Jinnai, the president of the student council, is caught up in an unscrupulous scandal; and finally, Makoto is completely immersed in inventing a device about which even he hasn`t got a clue. This incident occurs when this peaceful day is almost over. Jinnai, who`s just insulted Makoto, has caused his invention to operate recklessly. The machine roars, and throws Makoto and the others into another world. What will Makoto, Jinnai, Mr. Fujisawa and Nanami`s destinies be in this magnificent world?

externalentity.identifier: 神秘の世界エルハザード#TV版

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: love polygon
tag.description: A love polygon refers to a romantic relationship involving n people. Although a love triangle is not limited to just heterosexual relationships, in anime, it usually deals with two females liking one male and vice versa.

tag.name: action
tag.description: Action anime usually involve a fairly straightforward story of good guys versus bad guys, where most disputes are resolved by using physical force. It often contains a lot of shooting, explosions and fighting.

tag.name: fantasy
tag.description: Fantasy is a genre of fiction that uses magic and other supernatural phenomena as a primary element of plot, theme, or setting. Many works within the genre take place in fictional worlds where magic is common. Fantasy is generally distinguished from science fiction and horror by the expectation that it steers clear of (pseudo-)scientific and macabre themes, respectively, though there is a great deal of overlap between the three (which are subgenres of speculative fiction). In popular culture, the genre of fantasy is dominated by its medievalist form, especially since the worldwide success of The Lord of the Rings books by J. R. R. Tolkien. In its broadest sense however, fantasy comprises works by many writers, artists, filmmakers, and musicians, from ancient myths and legends to many recent works embraced by a wide audience today. Fantasy is a vibrant area of academic study in a number of disciplines (English, cultural studies, comparative literature, history, medieval studies). Work in this area ranges widely, from the structuralist theory of Tzvetan Todorov, which emphasizes the fantastic as a liminal space, to work on the connections (political, historical, literary) between medievalism and popular culture Source: Wiki

tag.name: adventure
tag.description: Adventures are exciting stories, with new experiences or exotic locales. Adventures are designed to provide an action-filled, energetic experience for the viewer. Rather than the predominant emphasis on violence and fighting that is found in pure action anime, however, the viewer of adventures can live vicariously through the travels, conquests, explorations, creation of empires, struggles and situations that confront the main characters, actual historical figures or protagonists. Under the category of adventures, we can include traditional swashbucklers, serialized films, and historical spectacles, searches or expeditions for lost continents, "jungle" and "desert" epics, treasure hunts and quests, disaster films, and heroic journeys or searches for the unknown. Adventure films are often, but not always, set in an historical period, and may include adapted stories of historical or literary adventure heroes, kings, battles, rebellion, or piracy.

tag.name: comedy
tag.description: Anime whose central struggle causes hilarious results. These stories are built upon funny characters, situations and events. A comedy anime is laced with humour and sets out to provoke laughter from the audience. Japanese humour can be a bit strange to westerners, so if you`re new to this type of humour, just bear with it; it`ll most likely grow on you if you`re a fan of other kinds of comedy.

tag.name: romance
tag.description: Romance describes a story that deals with love between two or more characters typically also having an optimistic ending. Romance is also a difficulty encountered when creating a harem.

tag.name: insects of doom
tag.description: Concerns insects, be them biological, magical or robotic in nature, that are either the bane, or a major stepping stone in the way of the main character(s) of the anime.

tag.name: isekai
tag.description:
An isekai story is one in which the lead characters are transferred to and become stuck or trapped in another world, one completely different from the one they lived in up until the transfer. The new world is commonly a http://anidb.net/t2628 [fictional world], such as a http://anidb.net/t2838 [parallel world] or http://anidb.net/t2839 [virtual world] (other fictional world types can also apply). What defines the isekai genre is that the characters are sent to another world, often but not always a parallel one, and they generally cannot come back permanently without meeting a highly specific goal. In order to adapt to their new environment, they must use the abilities and knowledge brought from their former world as well as any that may have been bestowed upon them by their brave new world. In some cases, they will seek and eventually find a way to return; in others, they will gleefully embrace their new life. http://anidb.net/a144 [Inuyasha] is an example where isekai applies to a fictional world that is not also a parallel or virtual world. http://anidb.net/ch7246 [Higurashi Kagome] climbs down an ancient well at her grandfather`s shrine and is transported to feudal Japan (time travel). While she eventually gains the physical ability to travel back and forth between her time period and feudal Japan, her bonds and responsibilities to feudal Japan tie her there until they are ultimately resolved. For clarity, below is an illustrative example where isekai is applied to a non-fictional, non-parallel, non-virtual world.
* The main characters are from Earth. One day, they are abducted by Nazis from Mars (alternate "world") are brought back to their Martian base. The main characters are trapped on Mars. Their only escape is to defeat the Nazis and steal their spaceship to return to Earth (specific goal required to escape); they are left to thier own devices, with no prospect of help from Earth, and no way to contact Earth.

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Mizuhara Makoto
character.description: The protagonist of the story. At the beginning of the first OVA, Makoto is to testify against Student Body President Katsuhiko Jinnai in an impeachment hearing. After school, Jinnai attacks him in an effort to prevent his testimony when time comes to a standstill. Making his way down to some ancient ruins underneath the school, Makoto discovers a mysterious, beautiful woman who sends him and the others still on the school campus to the world of El-Hazard.

character.name: Fujisawa Masamichi
character.description: The alcoholic, chain-smoking history teacher at Shinonome High School. Fujisawa is not widely respected among his students and has a very strong sense of school spirit. When he crosses over into El-Hazard, he gains super strength and athletic ability; he loses these powers if he has consumed too much alcohol.

character.name: Jinnai Nanami
character.description: Jinnai`s younger sister by about a year. Nanami is highly independent and strongly entrepreneurial, going so far as to take payment from the high school`s Broadcast Club to grill her brother over the fraudulent election results on campus television. When she`s sent to El-Hazard, she`s initially alone and is forced to take on a waitressing job to earn enough money to travel, but she eventually meets up with Makoto and Fujisawa at the Fountain of Arliman, where she is able to start a small business selling boxed lunches to the visiting priestesses. Nanami has feelings for Makoto, but she`s never really had the opportunity to talk about a relationship with him.

character.name: Jinnai Katsuhiko
character.description: Jinnai Katsuhiko manages to win the Student Body Presidential election by promising student government funds to campus clubs and organisations that voted for him. When Makoto catches wind of this and plans are made for him to testify against Jinnai (who is called "Jinnai" by everyone except his sister), the egocentric, power-hungry and soon-to-be-impeached Student Body President attempts to thwart the process by attacking Makoto, intending to keep him tied up until a technicality in the bylaws prevents him from being thrown out of office. Before he can execute his plan, however, he`s sent to El-Hazard, and once there encounters the Bugrom, a race of human-sized insectoid beings ruled by Queen Diva.

character.name: Run Venus
character.description: A princess of Roshtaria and Fatora`s older sister; she is both the leader of Roshtaria and the head of the Alliance. A serious, intelligent and kind-hearted ruler, she sends Makoto and Fujisawa on a mission to locate the Muldoon priestesses so that they can unseal the Eye of God. Even though Fatora`s absence renders the superweapon useless, she and the other Alliance members believe that such an action would deter the Bugrom from attacking. She`s also engaged to Prince Galus, who supports the action.

character.name: Ura
character.description: A cat and Fatora`s personal pet. Unlike felines of Earth, however, the cats of El-Hazard are able to stretch and wrap around humans, becoming a highly durable living armour. Ura is loaned to Makoto while he impersonates Fatora, and the cat saves his life on several occasions. As armour, Ura is at least strong enough to withstand a single blast of energy from Ifurita. He is also capable of limited human speech. A similar cat is seen around Rune Venus briefly, but is not named or otherwise shown again.

character.name: Alielle Relryle
character.description: Princess Fatora`s lesbian lover (there is no indication in the narrative that they are closeted in any way), she is introduced when she returns to the royal palace after visiting her parents and sneaks into Fatora`s bedroom while Makoto (still dressed as Fatora) is in bed. When she learns the whole truth, she becomes worried for the real Fatora`s safety and assists Makoto and Fujisawa as they travel to see the three priestesses of Mt. Muldoon, serving as their guide.

character.name: Miz Mishtal
character.description: The water priestess of Mt. Muldoon, as well as the oldest. Creeping towards thirty years of age, Miz`s main concern, aside from her duties as a priestess, is keeping herself looking beautiful and hoping that she`ll one day find a suitor so that she can marry and retire.

character.name: Afura Mann
character.description: The wind priestess of Mt. Muldoon. Of the three priestesses, her personality is delved into the least, and she comes off being rather wooden and serious most of the time, although she does make the occasional crack at Shayla`s expense. Even though she is about the same age as Shayla, she`s much more calm and composed.

character.name: Shayla-Shayla
character.description: At nineteen years of age, the youngest of the three priestesses. Holding true to the classic anime redhead stereotype, this tanned priestess` temper is as fiery as her hair, matching her control over the element of fire.

character.name: Ifurita
character.description: An ancient Demon God of El-Hazard. Although the specifics of her origin are never explained, it appears as though she is a biological machine designed to look like a beautiful young woman. When Makoto first encounters her under the high school, she seems to know him for some reason, and treats him warmly.

character.name: Diva
character.description: The ruler of the Bugrom. With the exception of a few features, she has the external appearance of a beautiful woman and is the only fully humanoid member of the tribe, though this may possibly be an illusion, as with the case of the ruler of the Insects in the Alternate World of Creteria. When Katsuhiko arrives in El-Hazard and is brought before her by some of her soldiers, she becomes convinced that he is actually a messenger sent by God destined to lead the Bugrom to victory over their enemies in the Alliance. Impressed by Katsuhiko`s ability to mobilise the troops and conquer nations with ease, she also becomes romantically interested in him.

episode.title: 冒険の大地へ!
Drawn into the Land of Adventure
Jusqu`à la terre d`aventures
Путешествие в страну приключений
Bouken no Daichi e!
episode.summary: Makoto is preparing a science experiment for the school festival. When jealous rival Jinnai sabotages it, he inadvertently opens a portal to a strange and magnificent world. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神秘の王国へ!
Exploring the Kingdom of Mystery
Jusqu`au royaume du mystère
Исследуя таинственный мир
Shinpi no Oukoku e!
episode.summary: Makoto and Mr. Fujisawa rescue a beautiful young woman from giant humanoid bugs. She introduces herself as Princess Rune Venus of Roshtaria, and takes the heroes to her palace. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魅惑の王女へ!
The Enchanting Princess
Jusqu`à la fascinante princesse
Очаровательная принцесса
Miwaku no Oujo e!
episode.summary: Makoto and Mr. Fujisawa look for a way home. Meanwhile, Jinnai enchants the Bugrom`s Queen with his idea to attack a village`s water supply. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 乙女の神殿へ!
The Lonely Priestess
Jusqu`à la chapelle des vierges
Одинокая жрица
Otome no Shinden e!
episode.summary: Rune Venus tells Makoto about three Great Priestesses whose ancient magic might be able to take him home. Makoto and Mr. Fujisawa journey to meet Miz Mistal, Priestess of Water. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 疾風の大空へ!
The Shrine of Wind
Jusqu`aux cieux des vents
Храм ветра
Shippuu no Oozora e!
episode.summary: Afura Mann, Priestess of Wind, has a massive library that may have answers for Makoto, but she demands that he helps to construct a building in return for her books. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 熱血の勝負へ!
A Game of Chance and Fire
Jusqu`aux combats ardents
Игра шанса и огня
Nekketsu no Shoubu e!
episode.summary: Makoto and Mr. Fujisawa journey to meet the Priestess of Fire, Shayla Shayla. Upon arrival at the shrine, Makoto discovers Shayla has lost her clothes, and the shrine, to a crooked gambler! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 金脈の屋台へ!
A Golden Opportunity
Jusqu`à la grande entreprise
Счастливый случай
Kinmyaku no Yatai e!
episode.summary: While others are seeking a way home, Nanami is working. From waitress, to cook, to entrepreneur, she`s tried hard to succeed on her own terms. But will she ever see Makoto again? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命の再会へ!
Reunion
Jusqu`à la nouvelle rencontre du destin
Воссоединение
Unmei no Saikai e!
episode.summary: Miz Mistal wishes for Mr. Fujisawa`s love at a legendary fountain. When it malfunctions, she fears a catastrophe has occurred at the Shrine of Water. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 盗賊の巣窟へ!
House of Thieves
Jusqu`au repère des voleurs
Дом воров
Touzoku no Soukutsu e!
episode.summary: Nanami decides to open her own restaurant. When the kingdom`s vegetables suddenly go missing, it`s a mystery only Makoto can solve! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 幻獣の密林へ!
The Jungle Beast
Jusqu`à la mystérieuse jungle
Лесное чудище
Genjuu no Mitsurin e!
episode.summary: A village is being threatened by a monster, which is attacking its crops and livestock. Seeking adventure, Mr. Fujisawa volunteers to go on a monster hunt. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 童心の花園へ!
A Child`s Heart
Jusqu`au jardin des fleurs du cœur infantile
Детское сердце
Doushin no Hanazono e!
episode.summary: Makoto and Mr. Fujisawa decide to help Rune Venus take care of some orphaned children. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最悪の展開へ!
Tomb of the Demon God
Jusqu`à la pire de toutes les fins
Гробница демона
Saiaku no Tenkai e!
episode.summary: The heat is oppressive! But isn`t just a heat wave. A prophecy decrees that when the land burns, and the heavens part, a castle where the devil is entombed will appear in the sky! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 究極の悪人へ!
Pure Evil Genius
Jusqu`à l`ultime méchant
Истинно злой гений
Kyuukyoku no Akunin e!
episode.summary: The ultimate weapon has awoken, and she`s under the control of Jinnai! He offers the people of Roshtaria a simple choice: Surrender unconditionally, or face the wrath of the devil Ifurita. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 伝説の雪原へ!
The Legendary Snowfield
Jusqu`aux légendaires plaines glacées
Легендарное снежное поле
Densetsu no Setsugen e!
episode.summary: One of the seven wonders of El-Hazard, the Legendary Snow falls only once every 100 years. Rune Venus remembers it from her childhood, and volunteers for a research expedition. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神官の物語へ!
Tale of the Priestesses
Jusqu`à l`histoire des grands prêtres
Повесть о жрицах
Shinkan no Monogatari e!
episode.summary: Flashback to Shayla`s childhood and how a chance encounter with an apprentice priestess changes her destiny. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 旋風の攻防へ!
Whirlwind
Jusqu`à la tornade
Ураган
Senpuu no Koubou e!
episode.summary: A gigantic whirlwind has appeared in the deserts of Roshtaria. Will Afura Mann`s mastery of the wind be enough to stop it? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天空の瞳へ!
The Eye of God
Jusqu`aux disciples du paradis
Глаз бога
Tenkuu no Hitomi e!
episode.summary: Rune Venus dreams of a golden room from her childhood, and wonders if it’s the Chamber of Promises. Makoto goes with her to investigate. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 誘拐の陰謀へ!
Operation: Abduction!
Jusqu`aux eaux sombres des rivières
Операция «Похищение»
Yuukai no Inbou e!
episode.summary: Jinnai attempts to reverse his fortunes with a daring plan. When Rune Venus visits the Barn Kingdom for a celebration, he`s going to kidnap her! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 暗黒の宮殿へ!
Hive of Darkness
Jusqu`au palais des ténèbres
Приют тьмы
Ankoku no Kyuuden e!
episode.summary: Makoto and Mr. Fujisawa are in hot pursuit of Jinnai in an attempt to rescue Rune Venus. When the Bugrom escape over the forbidden Great Saint River is all hope lost? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 兄妹の抗争へ!
Jinnai: Sister vs. Brother
Jusqu`à la bataille des frères et sœurs
Сестра против брата
Kyoudai no Kousou e!
episode.summary: Jinnai`s decision to kidnap Nanami along with Rune Venus backfires when she discovers she can speak to the Bugrom. When she proves more popular than him, are his dreams of glory over? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激闘の航路へ!
A Love in Peril
Jusqu`à l`amour tragique
Любовь в опасности
Gekitou no Kouro e!
episode.summary: The Great Saint River is a dangerous and forbidden sanctuary. While the priestesses` powers could assist in crossing it, are they willing to tread on Holy ground? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決死の救出へ!
A Death-Defying Rescue
Jusqu`au sauvetage aux portes de la mort
Спасение вопреки смертельной опасности
Kesshi no Kyuushutsu e!
episode.summary: Makoto will have to face the Bugrom, Ifurita, and Jinnai`s greatest trump card: Rune Venus. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 逃亡の旅路へ!
Escape
Jusqu`au voyage de fuite
Побег
Toubou no Tabiji e!
episode.summary: While Afura Mann and the Bugrom are searching for the Princess, Nanami has already found her! Will the two rivals be able to work together to find a way to safety? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命の主役へ!
Destiny
Jusqu`à la destinée
Судьба
Unmei no Shuyaku e!
episode.summary: Cataclysms rock the world and the Bugrom have launched an all-out invasion. Worst of all, the Eye of God is falling out of its orbit. Will Rune Venus return in time to stop total disaster? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 終末の世界へ!
The End of the World
Jusqu`au bout du monde
Конец света
Shuumatsu no Sekai e!
episode.summary: Jinnai`s dreams of conquest are about to come to fruition, but when Ifurita`s personality abruptly changes, he looses control of her. Is it the end for El-Hazard? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 無限の彼方へ!
The Eternal Dream
Jusqu`au monde éternel
Бесконечная мечта
Mugen no Kanata e!
episode.summary: Makoto might be able to release the reactor energy from the Eye of God, but will the cost be worth it? Source: crunchyroll
